name: pair_strength
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_quake.
Tool description: Provides Access to the statistical strength of all 8 major currencies, across 28 Forex pairs and on 4 different time frames.
API description: Exposes the underlying calculations that are performed on each pair to get a currencyâ€™s combined strength.

timeframe.description: The timeframe for which to retrieve the currency pair strength (e.g., 'h1', 'h4', 'd1', 'w1').
